overview: Hyeong-Do and Chang-Min went to same school. Chang-Do is a young man who keeps his hometown while Hyeong-Min leads a twisted life in Seoul with ambitious dream. Using fund of Madam Min, a bigwig, and her friends, Hyeong-Do buys home land a lot to take the margin. As his father dies during this turbulence, Chang-Min determines to take revenge and goes upto Seoul. While he wanders about downtown in Seoul, Chang-Min happened to meet Madam Min's friends and chases them one by one to take revenge on Madam Min.
title: Woman's Diary
